data.name: EditProfileMessageBody
ForgotPasswordBody
NoResponseFromTheSkipjack
OnRegister2FreeDownloadsUser
OnRegisterFreeUser
data.value:
Dear {full_name}:
Thank you for joining aishaudio.com, your 24/6 source for Jewish digital audio classes. Your email address, {email} will serve as your username whenever you log in.
Your password for your account {email} has been set to “{password}”.
Upon clicking on the the following link which will complete your Aishaudio.com registration, you will be given an opportunity to choose a permanent password. If the link below does not work for any reason, you may complete the registration process by logging in at Aishaudio.com with your email address and temporary password. Please note: passwords are case sensitive.
{link}
Every week, we’ll send you an e-update of new or free on-line listening classes.
The easiest way to unsubscribe is to hit reply to this e-mail and write unsubscribe in the subject line.
Thank you for joining. We hope that aishaudio.com wisdom will give you a great lift.
Rabbi Aaron Dayan and the staff of aishaudio.com

data.name: OnRegisterFreeUserWithoutEmailValidate
data.value:
Dear {full_name}:
Thank you for joining aishaudio.com, your 24/6 source for Jewish digital audio classes. Your email address, {email} will serve as your username whenever you log in.
Your password for your account {email} has been set to “{password}”.
Every week, we’ll send you an e-update of new or free on-line listening classes.
The easiest way to unsubscribe is to hit reply to this e-mail and write unsubscribe in the subject line.
Thank you for joining. We hope that aishaudio.com wisdom will give you a great lift.

data.name: OnRegisterMonthlyUser
data.value:
Dear {full_name}:
Thank you for joining aishaudio.com, your 24/6 source for Jewish digital audio classes. When you wish to access your account, please use the following login information:
Username: {email} Password: {password}
Every week, we'll send you an e-update to let you know about new releases, timely classes, and interesting promotions. The update lets you link directly to the class of your choice for free listening or downloading.
The easiest way to unsubscribe is to hit reply to this e-mail and write unsubscribe in the subject line.
Please note that each month you will receive an additional allotment of 10 units, up to a maximum of 28. In order that you do not miss out on any units, please make sure that you download enough classes each month to keep the unit balance in your account to 18 or less.
Thank you for joining. We hope that aishaudio.com wisdom gives you a great lift.
Rabbi Aaron Dayan and the staff of aishaudio.com
